title: Projected increase of the national defense budget in Canada fiscal years 2018 to 2027
yAxis: Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars
summary: This statistic shows the Annual increase national defense funding in the Canada from FY 2024-2025 to FY 2017-2018 , in million Canadian .
The largest amount of increase national defense funding is projected for fiscal Year 2017-2018 with some 2300 million Canadian requested for national defense funding .
gold: This statistic shows the projected increase over baseline spending for the national defense budget of Canada between the fiscal years 2018 to 2027.
In fiscal year 2027 , the defense budget for Canada is projected to be 2.3 billion Canadian dollars greater than 2026 budget .
